Title: Death of a Monarchy
Plot: Finale - Henry?s thoughts turn to his own mortality with the news that his long-time friend and sometimes foe King Francis, and his unshakable soldier Charles Brandon, are each dying. As he faces death, Henry encounters the ghosts of his former wives who each get a chance to confront him. Hans Holbein paints a last, iconic portrait of the Tudor King.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sex scenes and content that may disturb
